proactively find and address areas of concern and identify potential roadblocks</li>  <li>Lead in estimating of resource needs and timelines to complete short and long term projects as well as daily operational tasks</li>  <li>Lead in clarifying stakeholder requirements; communicate questions and address concerns; provide relevant and detailed updates and feedback in a timely manner</li>  <li>Mentor other team members and deliver effective code reviews to improve overall quality of the code base across the team</li>  <li>Research and prototype solutions for enterprise architecture; focus on constant learning, keep up to date with emerging technologies and demonstrate potential ways to utilize them to the companys advantage</li>  <li>Drive team focus towards project completion by proactively identifying and mitigating any project risks and roadblocks while providing any solutions when possible.</li>  <li>Design appropriate technical solutions based on requirements provided while taking into account timelines and future re-use ability</li>  <li>Develop and understanding of the business and its processes in order to design appropriate solutions.</li>  <li>Promote the use of development patterns and best practices.</li> </ul> <strong>Education and Experience</strong>  <ul> <li>Minimum 7 years of experience in a professional software development role</li>  <li>Post-secondary education in Computer Science, Application Development, or Information Technology (nice to have but not required)</li>  <li>Any IT related certification is an asset</li> </ul> <strong>Skills</strong>  <ul> <li>Solution Design Ability to define and describe an architecture of a system and understand the cause and effect of their coding</li>  <li>Collaborative communication skills (written and oral) - Ability to convert technical concepts into non-technical</li>  <li>Backend Development Some experience and applicable knowledge in backend development in any language (Ruby, PHP, .NET, etc.), relational databases, writing and optimizing queries (Postgres, My SQL, etc.)</li>  <li>Development from specs - Ability to find requirements and break them down into an actionable execution plan for the team and proactively identify problems.</li>  <li>Frontend Development some experience and applicable knowledge with HTML 5, CSS3 or Java Script</li> </ul> <br/><br/> <em>ITRG is an equal opportunity employer committed to diversity and inclusion. Title: Senior Software Developer

Job_Description: At Dealflo, we are revolutionizing how businesses and consumers execute financial transactions. Whether you’re buying a car, opening a bank account, getting a mortgage, or insuring your home, we’re here in real-time to make the entire online transaction secure, reliable, and enjoyable. <br/><br/> Our Financial Agreements Automation Platform enables our customers to securely verify electronic identities, seamlessly apply electronic signatures, and reliably ensure regulatory compliance. Our customers are among the world’s largest financial institutions and global enterprises, and Deloitte Technology Fast 50 recognized us as one of the fastest growing technology companies in the UK and Europe. <br/><br/> We are now looking for a <strong>Senior Full Stack Developer</strong> to join our Professional Services team in Montreal. <br/><br/> If you thrive on challenges and seek growth, then we want YOU on our Product Team! Our environment is built on trust, openness, and growth. We offer great benefits, excellent health insurance, flexible hours and work-from-home, a wonderful RRSP program, and a fantastic vacation package. <br/><br/> Day to day, you will… <ul>  <li>Evolve and enhance our current production SaaS application running on the AWS cloud</li> <li>Participate in the analysis, elaboration, and estimation of customer requirements and specifications</li> <li>Design, develop, and deploy new production-quality frontend and backend features and functionality that meet customer requirements</li> <li>Educate, guide, and interact with our customers’ technical staff throughout their development and integration efforts</li> <li>Perform design and code reviews, assist with refactoring, and provide guidance and mentoring to other developers</li> <li>Collaborate with application support to analyze, troubleshoot, reproduce, and resolve production issues reported by customers</li> <li>Work with other team members on release planning and deployment activities</li> <li>Innovate and improve development and implementation processes and tools by advocating technologies and designs that promote efficiency, reliability, and reusability</li> <li>Be proactive, facilitate knowledge sharing, and continually improve our activities</li> </ul> <strong>Requirements</strong> <br/><br/> To succeed, you have… <ul>  <li>Extensive experience in Core Java, J2EE, and Java frameworks such as Spring, Maven, and Hibernate</li> <li>Deep expertise in Web technologies including HTML, JavaScript, CSS, XSLT, REST, JSON, jQuery</li> <li>Experience in handling differences and limitations of various Web browsers</li></ul>   <ul>  <li>Deep understanding of asynchronous request handling, partial page updates, and AJAX</li> <li>Experience using software best practices like Test-Driven Development (TDD) and Continuous Integration (CI)</li> <li>Strong debugging and analytical skills</li> <li>Knowledge of front-end tools such as Grunt, Gulp.js, AngularJS, and Bootstrap; relational databases and SQL; and cryptography and security</li> <li>Worked as part of Scrum teams or similar iterative Agile development methodologies</li> <li>Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in software engineering or computer science</li></ul>   <ul>  <li>Practiced continuous improvement and promoted knowledge sharing</li> <li>Strong organizational skills, capable of managing assigned tasks and meeting deadlines</li> <li>Excellent leadership, interpersonal, communication, collaboration, and writing skills</li> </ul> Come be part of a rapidly growing and exciting SaaS business on a mission to own the global Financial Transaction Management market. We have built the team with the passion, ambition, and experience to make it happen. <br/><br/> So, what are you waiting for? Apply now!
Title: Senior Full Stack Developer (Contract)

Job_Description: <div> <div><strong>Android Developer</strong></div><br/>  <div>Montreal, QC</div><br/>  <div>(French version follows)</div><br/>  <div>TouchTunes is the largest in-venue interactive music and entertainment platform, featured in over 75,000 bars and restaurants across North America and Europe. Our network supports a growing portfolio of location-based digital solutions. We aim to create and deliver engaging music and media experiences worldwide in order to inspire emotional connections in shared spaces. In 2017 TouchTunes merged with PlayNetwork! Together weve created a global market leader for music and media services, with boundless opportunities for our team members to learn, contribute and grow. Were entrepreneurs, engineers, designers, marketers, creatives and visionaries. We are guided by our core values that serve as a compass for how we act and guide our approach to every aspect of our business every day. We are passionate about developing exciting and engaging products that impact consumers and generate emotional connections across our network of over 185,000 stores, restaurants, bars and other social spaces around the world.</div><br/>  <div>The Android Developer works cross-functionally with product owners, designers, backend developers, mobile developers and technical writers to conceptualize, execute, validate, document and deploy features in TouchTunes mobile products.</div>   <br/><strong><div><u>Key Qualifications:</u></div>  <br/></strong>   <ul>  	<li>2+ years Java programming experience in an Android mobile environment plus</li> <li>BS degree in Engineering or equivalent</li> </ul>  <strong><div><u>Required Skills/Competencies/Behavior:</u></div>  <br/></strong>   <ul>  	<li>Leads by example and exemplifies the company's Core Values in action and behavior</li> <li>Strong object-oriented programming and design skills</li> <li>Strong knowledge of the Java programming language</li> <li>Deep understanding of the Android SDK and APIs</li> <li>Experience using network-based resources</li> <li>Experience writing multi-threaded, asynchronous code</li> <li>Deep understanding of software design patternsassion for clean, consistent, simple and efficient code</li> <li>Strong mobile application UI development skills</li> <li>Strong problem solving and critical thinking skills</li> <li>Passion for quality and attention to detail</li> <li>Outstanding written and verbal communication skills</li> <li>Multimedia software development experience</li> <li>Experience with Sketch, Photoshop or similar graphics design tools</li> <li>Knowledge of UI frameworks, MVP application design and complex, reactive touch based UI</li> <li>Track record of optimizing code for size and performance on embedded platforms</li>  </ul>  <div><strong>Développeur Android</strong></div><br/>  <div>Cest le moment idéal pour faire partie de TouchTunes http://montreal.touchtunes.com! La refonte de notre application mobile, notre expansion en Europe et le développement de notre produit TV, contribuent un environnement stimulant et dynamique. Lacquisition récente de Music Direction a élargi nos services pour inclure la création de programmes musicaux personnalisés, pour les entreprises de vente au détail et dans le secteur de lhôtellerie.</div><br/>  <div>Nous avons un environnement de travail très collaboratif où tous apportent leur contribution directe pour relever les défis de l'entreprise. Nos employés sont passionnés de musique et résolus livrer nos clients les meilleurs médias interactifs et leur faire vivre une expérience de divertissement mémorable.</div><br/>  <div>Touchtunes cherche ajouter une <strong>Développeur Android</strong> son équipe de Développement.</div><br/>  <div>Travailler de manière transfonctionnelle avec les responsables de produits, les concepteurs, les développeurs backend, les développeurs d'applications mobiles ainsi quavec les rédacteurs techniques pour conceptualiser, exécuter, valider, documenter et déployer les fonctionnalités des produits mobiles de TouchTunes.</div>  <br/><strong><div>Qualifications :</div>  <br/></strong>   <ul>  	<li>Deux ans et plus dexpérience en programmation Java dans un environnement mobile Android</li> <li>B. Sc. en génie ou léquivalent</li> </ul>  <strong><div>Compétences requises :</div>  <br/></strong>   <ul>  	<li>Solides compétences en programmation orienté objet et en de conception</li> <li>Connaissance approfondie du langage de programmation Java</li> <li>Compréhension approfondie du kit de développement Android et APIs</li> <li>Expérience dutilisation de ressources réseau</li> <li>Expérience en écriture de code asynchrone multi fil</li> <li>Connaissance approfondie des modèles de conception logicielle</li> <li>Passion pour le code concis, cohérent, simple et efficace</li> <li>Solides compétences en développement dinterface utilisateur</li> <li>Passion pour la qualité et sens du détail</li> <li>Excellentes compétences en communication orale et écrite</li> <li>Expérience en développement de logiciels multimédia</li> <li>Expérience avec Sketch, Photoshop ou autres outils de conception graphiques similaires</li> <li>Connaissance des infrastructures dinterface utilisateur, de la conception MVP et des interfaces utilisateur tactiles</li> <li>Expérience doptimisation de code en ce qui concerne la taille et la performance sur les plates- formes embarquées</li> </ul>  </div> <br/>
Title: Android Developer

Job_Description: Skip is growing at a rapid pace and with that, we will need to expand our elite team of software developers and engineers to advance the innovation and improvements of our existing technology. Were looking for talented and experienced React developers that can pave future of our industry-leading tools and redefine what it means to stay ahead of game. <br/><br/> People need to eat so Skip never sleeps, and that means the show runs around the clock. Were looking for people who want the chance of contributing to build a world-class tech company right here in the Canadian Prairies. <br/><br/> The skills youll need: <ul> <li>Experience developing, releasing, and maintaining iOS or Android apps</li><li>Solid understanding of ReactiveX, using Swift and/or Java 8</li><li>Familiarity with React Native or eager to learn</li><li>Deep familiarity with debugging, performance measurement, and test-driven development</li><li>Solid understanding of REST principles and exposure to backend</li> </ul> People were looking for: <ul> <li>Have a great attitude and are proven self-starters</li><li>Keep hustling and are able to work through rejection</li><li>Thrive in a rapidly changing environment</li><li>Understand that a startup is not a 9-5 job, it's a lifestyle!</li> </ul> What its like to work at Skip: <ul> <li>Fast paced entrepreneurial environment</li><li>Casual dress attire, we focus on results, not wearing suits</li><li>Exposure to leading-edge technology</li><li>Advancement opportunities for high contributors</li><li>Merit-based compensation & benefits</li> </ul>
Title: Mobile Developer

Job_Description: <div>   <ul>   <li>SHARE</li></ul> </div> <br/>Position: <strong>Senior/Mobile Application Developer</strong> <br/><br/> Job Code:<strong> TB/180101/SSEMOB/PUN/S03</strong> <br/><br/> No. Of Openings: <strong>10</strong> <br/><br/> Location: <strong>PUNE INDIA</strong> <br/><br/> Job Type:<strong> Full Time</strong> <br/><br/> Start date<strong>: Immediately</strong> <br/><br/> <strong>Job Description:</strong> <br/><br/> This is a full-time position for an experienced Senior Mobile Applications Developer. During this engagement you will work with TechBlocks clients and relevant stakeholders on site and from TechBlocks head office in PUNE towards designing, developing, maintenance and enhancement of enterprise cross platform mobile applications. you’ll be Responsible for end-to-end Mobile Application Development life cycle. You will contribute to the success of our organization by applying technical knowledge and advanced problem-solving skills to develop and implement appropriate development strategies and plans within an agile development. <br/><br/> <strong>Responsibilities:</strong>  <ul> <li>Responsible for the entire mobile application lifecycle (concept, design, coding, testing, debugging, release, support and documentation).</li> <li>Make architecture recommendations, and provide guidance and expertise on designing product solutions to work with mobile devices.</li> <li>Integrate with existing backend services and possibly create new services to support mobile applications and design interfaces.</li> <li>Analyze and resolve application performance problems, and create or modify procedures to solve complex problems considering mobile device capacity and limitations, operating time and form of desired results.</li> <li>Offer Support for production issues</li> <li>Fix bugs</li> </ul> <strong>Job Requirements:</strong>  <ul> <li>Bachelors degree in related field</li> <li>5+ years of demonstrable software development experience building and maintaining mobile apps (Android/iOS/Cross-platform) and web-based systems</li> <li>Strong understanding of modern mobile application development principles and iOS/Android app deployment procedures</li> <li>Experience on at least 2-3 mobile implementations involving Cordova / Phonegap, Angular JS, JavaScript, Ionic framework, Android and/or iOS native SDKs for building Cordova plugins.</li> <li>Experience with web technologies, HTML, CSS, JavaScript</li> <li>Experience with SQL Server, SQL Lite and T-SQL is required</li> <li>Experience in Mobile Hybrid application development using Cordova, HTML5, Advance JavaScript and CSS3</li> <li>Experience with front end JavaScript MV* frameworks such as Angular, React/ React Native, RAD.js, Ember, Knockout, or Backbone</li> <li>Experience with Node.js, NPM, Grunt, Gulp</li> <li>Experience with Visual Studio, Chrome Developer tools, Safari Developer tools</li> <li>Experience in iOS and Android Development technologies (Xcode, Android Studio)</li> <li>Knowledge of mobile app Security Best Practices</li> <li>Knowledge of REST/JSON services</li> <li>Good written and verbal communication skills</li> </ul> <br/><br/> <strong>About TechBlocks</strong> <br/><br/> TechBlocks is a leading software development firm, with a key focus on digital transformation for the enterprise. We unify strategy, design and technology to transform businesses and drive competitive differentiation. We specialize in system integration and building customized business apps that allow our clients to improve their efficiency, collaboration and customer experience. <br/><br/> We are always looking for more great people to fill key roles as we continue to expand. Our employees operate with a client first mind-set and are flexible, reliable and responsive to our customers needs. <br/><br/> <strong>Application & Process</strong> <br/><br/> If you enjoy a fun team environment and want to contribute to the continued growth and development of TechBlocks – we’d love to talk to you. <br/><br/> All qualified and interested applicants are invited to apply, in confidence. <br/><br/> Please click “Apply Now” and include a link to your resume. <br/><br/> Thank you<br/> <div>Apply</div>
Title: Senior Mobile Application Developer

Job_Description: We are looking for a Frontend Software Developer to join our rapidly growing startup focusing on AI-powered Conversational Marketing Platform. <br/><br/> This is a unique opportunity to join a VC-funded startup with a team of creative and passionate individuals destined to change the face of digital marketing. This role is core to our company's product. Your focus will be development of all client-side logic and user interfaces. This is your chance to work on cutting-edge technology in the chatbot space. <br/><br/> The team works in quick iterations, using the techniques and algorithms best suited for solving our challenging problems. <br/><br/> Responsibilities  <ul>  	<li>Implementation of front-end logic and interfaces in React</li>  <li>Implementation of the backend logic in Python and Go</li>  <li>Integration of user-facing elements with server side logic (GraphQL)</li>  <li>Building reusable code and libraries for future use</li>  <li>Optimization of the application for maximum speed and scalability</li> </ul> Skills And Qualifications  <ul>  	<li>Understanding of front-end technologies and platforms, such as JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3</li>  <li>Integration of multiple data sources and databases into one system</li>  <li>Experience in JavaScript frameworks such as React, or Angular</li>  <li>Data migration, transformation, and scripting</li>  <li>Creating database schemas that represent and support business processes</li>  <li>Implementing automated testing platforms and unit tests</li>  <li>Proficient knowledge of a back-end programming languages such as Python, or Go (golang)</li>  <li>Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git</li> </ul>
Title: Front-end Developer

Job_Description: <strong>Why join Irdeto?</strong> <br/><br/> We are on a mission! A mission to secure the world’s digital platforms. Why? Because a secure platform allows our clients to produce and deliver great content. In return, you can enjoy the latest blockbuster movies and your favorite live events at all times. It doesn’t stop at the media industry. Our security technology is also securing connected transport and IoT applications. We are innovative, international and part of Naspers, one of the largest technology investors in the world. <br/><br/> <strong>Cloakware™</strong> <strong>Market Unit</strong> <br/><br/> Our mission is to become the number 1 software security provider on the planet in terms of usability, security and brand. That is why the Cloakware<strong>™</strong> team is responsible for leveraging the world’s best software security to protect digital platforms. The team focuses on building, delivering and supporting Cloakware<strong>™</strong> for automotive, payments and banking, games and future IoT markets. <br/><br/> We are currently seeking candidates with expertise in the broad area of programming languages technologies, including one or more of the following: compilers, interpreters, intermediate representations (IRs), source-to-source language transformations and compiler optimizations, type systems, the semantics of programming languages and static analysis such as data-flow analysis. <br/><br/> The ideal candidate will contribute to our High Assurance Software Protection Tools and Technologies including to our state of the art Obfuscation and Tamper proofing technology areas. While strong emphasis is put on correctness and reliability of the tools we will be developing, we also strive to build on top of our many years of industry-leading obfuscation, anti-tamper and white-box cryptography techniques. <br/><br/> <strong>Primary Responsibilities:</strong>  <ul>  	<li>Design, develop, verify and test, deploy, maintain and improve software.</li> <li>Perform various analysis and testing tasks to improve the correctness, performance and general quality of the tools products.</li> <li>Manage project deadlines and priorities in a self-directed fashion.</li> <li>Thoroughly document the research, architecture/design and implementations of solutions.</li> <li>Create and share ideas and knowledge by both speaking and writing through presentations and papers to internal technical staff and to external working groups and conferences.</li> </ul> <strong>Qualifications:</strong>  <ul>  	<li>Bachelor’s or Graduate degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, Electrical Engineering, or related field.</li> </ul> <strong>Required Skills & Experience:</strong>  <ul>  	<li>Hands-on compiler and/or interpreter development experience.</li> <li>Knowledge of compiler backend technologies such as code generation, register allocation and loop transformations, etc.</li> <li>Knowledge of compiler frontend technologies such as parsers and parser generators and type checking</li> <li>Experience and programming skills in one or more of: C, C++, Java and knowledge of one or more of Haskell, OCaml, Scheme.</li> <li>Hands-on experience with low-level debugging</li> <li>Ability to read, understand and interpret language standards such as ISO/IEC 9899:2011</li> <li>Knowledge of language semantics and formalisms is an important asset</li> <li>Knowledge of open source development including tooling such as Git, makefiles/make and CMake</li> <li>Extensive experience with design, development and debugging especially in a Linux environment</li> <li>Knowledge of intermediate representations especially with the LLVM framework and LLVM IR</li> <li>Clear, concise verbal, and written communication</li> <li>Have a strong sense of customer focus and teamwork</li> <li>Enjoy <em>getting the job done</em>; on time and to a high degree of quality</li> </ul> <strong>What do we offer you?</strong> <br/><br/> At Irdeto, we know that it is the people who make our company a success. We encourage personal and professional growth and success among our globally diverse workforce by offering:  <ul>  	<li>Competitive remuneration and benefits</li> <li>Career and personal development opportunities</li> <li>Flexible working spaces in state of the art offices</li> <li>A focus on collaboration, creativity, health and happiness</li> <li>Working for a truly global company with offices in 15+ countries</li> </ul> With nearly 50 successful years of business innovation behind us, Irdeto is a solid company to join. We are looking for people who are energetic, dynamic and driven to be part of our community. <br/><br/> <strong>Welcome to Irdeto!</strong> <br/><br/> <em>Click here to learn more about Irdeto.</em>
Title: Compiler Developer - High Assurance Software Protection

Job_Description: Aviso Wealth is a national, integrated financial services company owned by the Credit Union Centrals, CUMIS and Desjardins. Our investment and insurance dealers support thousands of financial advisors at hundreds of credit unions across Canada. Our award-winning online brokerage, Qtrade Investor, and our automated investing platform, VirtualWealth, give Canadians flexible choices for building their wealth. Our asset manager, NEI Investments, is a Canadian leader in Responsible Investment funds and portfolios, which are available through a national network of advisors. Aviso also provides custodial services and introducing broker services to independent financial organizations, including banks, trust companies, insurance companies, investment dealers, portfolio managers and financial planning firms. Aviso has major operations in Vancouver and Toronto, along with regional offices across Canada. <br/><br/> A career with Aviso means being part of a group of talented, energetic professionals who live their values every day, and belonging to an organization dedicated to your success and career development. If you’re looking for interesting and challenging work, at a company committed to its people, apply to join our team. <br/><br/> <strong>Job Overview:</strong> <br/><br/> In this role the selected candidate will be building web based brokerage trading applications, web service based architectures / middleware. In addition, integrating trading functionality between various trading partnering organizations as well as creating and maintaining technical documentation will be among main responsibilities. <br/><br/> <strong>Requirements</strong> <br/><br/> <strong>Educational qualifications:</strong> <ul>  <li>Must hold a degree or diploma in either computer science or engineering from a recognized institution</li> <li>Must have 5-10 years of enterprise Java development experience in the areas of web application development, swing application development, and backend middleware development.</li>  <li>Must have the ability to multi-task and demonstrate a proven ability to deliver in a fast paced, dynamic technical environment.</li> <li>Software process knowledge</li>  <li>Prior experience in the construction of brokerage trading applications is mandatory.</li> <li>Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, are also mandatory.</li>  </ul> <strong>Skills and Knowledge:</strong> <ul>  <li>JEE (Java, JSP, Servlets, JDBC, Spring)</li> <li>HTML, DHTML, Java script</li> <li>SQL Databases (Oracle 11g & SQL Server 2005/2008)</li> <li>Application Servers (BEA WebLogic 10.3 or JBoss 5.0 or Tomcat 6)</li> <li>Web Application Frameworks (Jakarta Struts / GWT)</li> <li>Swing / Web Start</li> <li>JEE Design Patterns</li> <li>Web Services & SOA (ESB/WSDL/XSD/UDDI/JAX-B/JAX-RPC)</li> <li>IntelliJ IDEA or Eclipse or NetBeans IDE</li> <li>Clustering / Load Balancing methodologies</li> <li>Brokerage Trading Methodologies</li> <li>Version Control Systems/Methodologies (CVS)</li> <li>Windows, Linux</li> </ul> <strong>Desired Skills:</strong> <ul>  <li>Caching technologies</li>  <li>Smart order routing / multi-marketplace knowledge</li> <li>Financial protocols and stock exchange messaging knowledge (FIX)</li> <li>Trade order management system methodologies and architectures</li> </ul> Aviso Wealth welcomes and encourages applications from all qualified individuals including persons with disabilities. If you require an accommodation, we will work with you to meet your needs in all stages of the hiring process. <br/><br/> For more company information, please refer to our website at www.aviso.ca <br/><br/> We thank all applicants for their interest, however only those selected for further consideration will be contacted. <br/><br/> No recruiters or agencies, please.
Title: Senior Trading Developer

Join our team and make a difference!</div>  </div> </div>  </div> <div> <div> Your Job</div>  </div> <div> <div> <div> <div><strong><em>About us</em></strong> <br/> How do you imagine life at an insurance company - its people, its culture, its offices?
